Actors: Kiefer Sutherland, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Carlos Bernard, Dennis Haysbert
Plot: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
Language: English, Russian, German, Korean, Arabic, Spanish, Serbian, Mandarin
Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 46 wins & 152 nominations.
